.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-vkGetImageSparseMemoryRequirements2-device-parameter]] pname:device must: be a valid sname:VkDevice handle
* [[VUID-vkGetImageSparseMemoryRequirements2-pInfo-parameter]] pname:pInfo must: be a valid pointer to a valid sname:VkImageSparseMemoryRequirementsInfo2 structure
* [[VUID-vkGetImageSparseMemoryRequirements2-pSparseMemoryRequirementCount-parameter]] pname:pSparseMemoryRequirementCount must: be a valid pointer to a basetype:uint32_t value
* [[VUID-vkGetImageSparseMemoryRequirements2-pSparseMemoryRequirements-parameter]] If the value referenced by pname:pSparseMemoryRequirementCount is not `0`, and pname:pSparseMemoryRequirements is not `NULL`, pname:pSparseMemoryRequirements must: be a valid pointer to an array of pname:pSparseMemoryRequirementCount sname:VkSparseImageMemoryRequirements2 structures
****
